mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Hunt, Oliver B.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Rone Co., VA [Roane County, West Virginia]

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Hunt, Oliver B. Patient Age: 25. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Sub acute inflammation of lungs following measles. Result: Cured home on furlough. Returned as deserter 1864/08/20.
